pageContent: Objective: The aim of this study was to evaluate the value of computed tomography (CT) in determining total prostate volume (TPV), as an alternative to transrectal ultrasonography (TRUS) when TRUS is not available.

metaData.source:
Focal therapy for localised unifocal and multifocal prostate cancer: a prospective development study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22512844/
